channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6895, MT6985, MT8168, MT8781
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6895, MT6985, MT8168, MT8781

item.title: CVE-2023-20636|2024-08-02T09:14:39.614Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6895%2C%20mt6985%2C%20mt8168%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In display drm, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07292593; Issue ID: ALPS07292593.
